components.description: An elderly man gray (grey) hair, and visible wrinkles. Balding in many versions of this artwork, such as Apple and Microsoft designs.
components.title: Older Man

description: An elderly man gray (grey) hair, and visible wrinkles. Balding in many versions of this artwork, such as Apple and Microsoft designs.
title: Older Man

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Portrait and role symbols

emoji_net_data.name: old man

bn:00096644a: Advanced in years; (`aged' is pronounced as two syllables)

bn:00110401a: Older; higher in rank; longer in length of tenure or service

bn:00106354a: Of, relating to, or denoting a member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
Being the sex (of plant or animal) that produces gametes (spermatozoa) that perform the fertilizing function in generation

bn:00082449v: Begin to seem older; get older
To begin to look older; to get older.

bn:00024989n: An informal term for a father; probably derived from baby talk
Dad, daddy, father; a familiar or old-fashioned term of address to one's father.
Papa is a nickname which may refer to.

bn:00052968n: Determined sex of an animal. Use Q6581097 for a male human
A member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A person who belongs to the sex that cannot have babies
A male organism is the physiological sex which produces sperm.
An animal of the sex that has testes.

bn:00030100n: An older person or an older member, usually a leader, of some community.
Someone older than someone else (with possessive).
A name suffix used after a child's name when his parent has the same name
The style at the end of a person's name which gives additional identifying information about the person
An older person (usually considered to be above the age of 60).
Person respected and listened to for being old in age or in membership.
A person who is older than you are
A name suffix, in the Western English-language naming tradition, follows a person's full name and provides additional information about the person.

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

bn:00041536n: A male person who is old of age.
A man who is very old
Any person or thing that has lived to a very old age.
Greybeard is a science fiction novel by British author Brian Aldiss, published in 1964.

bn:00041310n: The father of your father or mother
